segments.text: Over on the other side of the kitchen, there's quite a different situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched upward towards an open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, I can clearly see a large jar labeled 'COOKIE JAR' filled to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand inside, grabbing some treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate, perhaps to catch his bounty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister stands below, looking up with such eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, palm open, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's really quite a cheeky operation they've got going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks so unstable; its legs are splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It genuinely looks like it could tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't heard the clanking of the jar or their hushed whispers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are truly dedicated to their cookie quest.
segments.speaker: PAR
